title: Multi Jar Bottle Opener,All in One Bottle Opener,5-in-1 and 6-in-1 Multi Opener Kitchen Tools Set,Can Jar Opener Kit with Ergonomic Anti Slip Grip Handle,Safe and Efficient Opening (Style 1)
features: ?Wide range of applications: pack of 2 multi jar opener, 6-in-1 and 5-in-1 bottle opener. This amazing set enables you to open any jar or bottle by exerting minimal effort and putting no extra stress on your fragile hand joint and ligaments.

?Practical design: The opener's curved handle is designed to conform to the principles of ergonomics. It has a comfortable grasp, enhanced grip, and less effort. Time saving, necessary tool for the elderly and so on.
?Easy to operate: these two jar opener and can opener are small and lightweight, delicate and compact, sturdy, abrasion resistance and rust prevention, and dishwasher-safe.
?Essential kitchen gear: easily remove tightly sealed lids from condiment, marmalade and pickled food jars and more with next to no effort, instantly satisfy your cravings.
?A perfect gift for your neighbor and family, and any quality issue, please feel free to Contact us, We are responsible for any quality issue, please feel free to Contact us.
description: Are You Still Looking For a Simple And Convenient Way to Open Various Sealed Containers   Feature  Instantly removes food seals and pull tabs Save your fingers and nails Easily twist of soda caps and water bottles Specially designed for those with arthritis and low strength Easily slice open food packages with the built in blade function Unique kitchen essential has a soft grip comfortable coating and made of stainless steel   Product details:  Material: Stainless steel+PP+TPR rubber(grip) Dimension:5.7inch*2.3inch*1cinch Weight: 65g  Material: Stainless steel+PP+TPR rubber(grip) Weight: 105g   The 5-in-1 Multi-Opener functions? A bottle opener (for traditional glass bottles) -- pop off bottle caps A screw-top opener (for plastic screw-top bottles) -- Twist open plastic bottles A pull tab hook (for pull tabs, e.g. tin of cat food) -- Pull open pull-tabs A pop tab hook (for pop tabs, e.g. soda cans) -- Pop open pop-tabs A "jar hook" that breaks the container's vacuum-seal, making the lid effortless to twist off -- Hook jar lids & pop their vacuum seal (then twist the lid off with ease)   The 6-in-1 Multi-Opener functions?  A   pull tab hook -- Pull open pull-tabs  A   pop tab hook -- Pop off bottle caps  A   bottle opener -- Grip & twist open stubborn jar lids  A   handle that grips tight lids for easy twist-off -- Twist open plastic bottle  A   hidden blade for opening bags -- Slice open bags with the hidden blade  A   clamp for opening safety seals (e.g. on a new ketchup bottle) -- Tear off safety seals
